class.name: MediaPipeAudioClassifier
class.description: MediaPipe audio task for performing audio classification on audio clips or audio stream.

method.name: classify
method.description: Performs audio clip classification on [param audio_data]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_CLIPS].

method.name: classify_async
method.description: Sends [param audio_data] to perform audio classification. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_STREAM].

signal.name: result_callback
signal.description: Emitted when audio classifier initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_STREAM] returns classification result.
